name: Sarah Thompson
bio: With 8 years of experience working with dogs of all temperaments, I specialize in helping anxious and reactive dogs using positive reinforcement methods.

name: Michael Rodriguez
qualifications: Bachelor of Animal Science, Victoria University
bio: After 12 years working with challenging dogs, I've developed effective methods for resolving behavioral issues using science-based approaches.

name: Emily Chen
qualifications: Karen Pryor Academy Certified Training Partner
bio: I focus on in-home training for dogs with anxiety and leash reactivity issues, using force-free methods that build confidence.

name: David Wilson
bio: With over 15 years working with rescue organizations, I specialize in rehabilitating dogs with complex behavioral challenges and trauma.

name: Jessica Patel
bio: I help city dogs and their owners navigate urban environments confidently, with a focus on enrichment and managing reactivity.
